sentence.text: We evaluated the genetic negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of the amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (signal transduction) risk gene never in mitosis gene a-related kinase 1 (protein phosphorylation) in a Belgian cohort of 278 patients with ALS (n = 245) or ALS with frontotemporal dementia (ALS-FTD, n = 33) and 609 control individuals.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
